scripts.setup: npm install && cd apps/skill-sense-api && npm install && cd ../skill-sense-shell && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:web: cd apps/skill-sense-shell && npm run lint || echo 'Lint not configured'
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:web
scripts.deploy:api: cd apps/skill-sense-api && gcloud run deploy skill-sense-api --source . --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:web: cd apps/skill-sense-shell && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
